original_title: Wilson Phillips: Live from Infinity Hall
overview: Wilson Phillips, one of the best-selling female groups of all time, brings their smash album, Dedicated, to the stage in a new video, Live From Infinity Hall. Recorded live on February 24, 2012, the concert captures the band's unique harmony-rich sound on songs made famous by their parents, The Mammas & The Papas and The Beach Boys. Included are such well-known hits as "Wouldn't It Be Nice," "Monday Monday" and "California Dreamin'" plus their own worldwide smash, "Hold On." Live at Infinity Hall aired nationwide on public television and the video includes a bonus performance of "Good Vibrations."
title: Wilson Phillips: Live from Infinity Hall
